subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Max Scherzer, who was trying to become the first pitcher in the majors to start 14-0 since Roger Clemens in 1986, allowed four runs and eight hits in six innings against the Rangers.
snippet: Max Scherzer, who was trying to become the first pitcher in the majors to start 14-0 since Roger Clemens in 1986, allowed four runs and eight hits in six innings against the Rangers.
